Verses: 1 pinbu Naan Paarththapodhu, Idho, Seeyon Malaiyinmel Aattukkuttiyaanavaraiyum, Avarodekooda Avarudaiya Pidhaavin Naamam Thangal Netrigalil Ezhudhappattirundha Ilatchaththu Naarpaththu Naalaarayiramperaiyum Nirkakkanden.

2 allaamalum, Peruvella Iraichchalpolavum, Balaththa Idimuzhakkampolavum, Oru Saththam Vaanaththilirundhu Undaagakketten; Naan Ketta Saththam Suramandalakkaarar Thangal Suramandalangalai Vaasikkira Osaiyaippolirundhadhu.

3 avargal Singaasanaththirku Munbaagavum, Naangu Jeevangalukku Munbaagavum, Mooppargalukku Munbaagavum Pudhuppaattaip Paadinaargal; Andhap Paattu Boomiyilirundhu Meettukkollappatta Ilatchaththu Naarpaththunaalaayirampereyallaamal Oruvarum Katrukkollakkoodaadhirundhadhu.

4 sthireegalaal Thangalaik Karaippaduththaadhavargal Ivargale; Karpullavargal Ivargale; Aattukkuttiyaanavar Enge Ponaalum Avaraip Pinpatrugiravargal Ivargale; Ivargal Manusharilirundhu Dhevanukkum Aattukkuttiyaanavarukkum Mudharbalanaaga Meettukkollappattavargal.
5 ivargaludaiya Vaayile Kabadam Kaanappadavillai; Ivargal Dhevanudaiya Singaasanaththirkumunbaaga Maasillaadhavargalaayirukkiraargal.

6 pinbu, Veroru Thoodhan Vaanaththin Maththiyile Parakkakkanden; Avan Boomiyil Vaasampannugira Sagala Jaadhigalukkum, Koththiraththaarukkum, Baashaikkaararukkum, Janakkoottaththaarukkum Arivikkaththakkadhaaga Niththiya Suviseshaththai Udaiyavanaayirundhu,

7 migundha Saththamittu: Dhevanukkup Bayandhu, Avarai Magimaippaduththungal; Avar Niyaayaththeerppukkodukkum Velai Vandhadhu; Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Samuththiraththaiyum Neerootrugalaiyum Undaakkinavaraiye Thozhudhukollungalendru Koorinaan.
8 veroru Thoodhan Pinsendru: Baabilon Magaa Nagaram Vizhundhadhu! Vizhundhadhu! Than Vesiththanamaagiya Ukkiramaana Madhuvaich Sagala Jaadhigalukkum Kudikkakkoduththaale! Endraan.

9 avargalukkup Pinne Moondraam Thoodhan Vandhu, Migundha Saththamittu: Mirugaththaiyum Adhin Soroobaththaiyum Vanangith Than Netriyilaavadhu Than Kaiyilaavadhu Adhin Muththiraiyaith Thariththukkollugiravanevano,

10 avan Dhevanudaiya Kobaakkinaiyaagiya Paaththiraththile Kalappillaamal Vaarkkappatta Avarudaiya Ukkiramaagiya Madhuvaik Kudiththu, Parisuththa Thoodhargalukkumunbaagavum, Aattukkuttiyaanavarukkumunbaagavum Akkiniyinaalum Gandhagaththinaalum Vaadhikkappaduvaan.

11 avargaludaiya Vaadhaiyin Pugai Sadhaakaalangalilum Ezhumbum; Mirugaththaiyum Adhin Soroobaththaiyum Vanangugiravargalukkum, Adhinudaiya Naamaththin Muththiraiyaith Thariththukkollugira Evanukkum Iravum Pagalum Ilaippaarudhaliraadhu.
12 dhevanudaiya Karpanaigalaiyum Iyesuvin Melulla Visuvaasaththaiyum Kaaththukkollugiravargalaagiya Parisuththavaangaludaiya Porumai Idhile Vilangum Endru Koorinaan.

13 pinbu, Paralogaththilirundhu Oru Saththam Undaagak Ketten; Adhu Karththarukkul Marikkiravargal Idhumudhal Paakkiyavaangal Endrezhudhu; Avargal Thangal Pirayaasangalai Vittozhindhu Ilaippaaruvaargal; Avargaludaiya Kiriyaigal Avargalode Koodappom; Aaviyaanavarum Aam Endru Thiruvulampatrugiraar Endru Sollitru.

14 pinbu Naan Paarththapodhu, Idho, Venmaiyaana Megaththaiyum, Andha Megaththinmel Manushakumaaranukkoppaanavaraaith Thamadhu Sirasinmel Porkireedaththaiyum Thamadhu Kaiyile Karukkulla Arivaalaiyumudaiya Oruvar Utkaarndhirukkiradhaiyum Kanden.

15 appozhudhu Veroru Thoodhan Dhevaalayaththilirundhu Purappattu, Megaththinmel Utkaarndhirukkiravarai Nokki: Boomiyin Payir Mudhirndhadhu, Arukkiradharkuk Kaalam Vandhadhu, Aagaiyaal Ummudaiya Arivaalai Neetti Aruththuvidum Endru Migundha Saththamittusonnaan.
16 appozhudhu Megaththinmel Utkaarndhavar Thamadhu Arivaalaip Boomiyinmel Neettinaar, Boomiyin Vilaivu Aruppundadhu.
17 pinbu Veroru Thoodhanum Karukkulla Arivaalaip Pidiththukkondu Paralogaththilulla Dhevaalayaththilirundhu Purappattuvandhaan.

18 akkiniyinmel Adhikaaramulla Veroru Thoodhanum Balipeedaththilirundhu Purappattuvandhu, Karukkulla Arivaalaippidiththirukkiravanai Nokki: Boomiyin Thiraatchappazhangal Pazhuththirukkiradhu, Karukkulla Umadhu Arivaalai Neetti, Adhin Kulaigalai Aruththuvidum Endru Migundha Saththaththode Sonnaan.
19 appozhudhu Andhath Thoodhan Than Arivaalaip Boomiyin Mele Neetti, Boomiyin Thiraatchappazhangalai Aruththu, Dhevanudaiya Kobaakkinaiyennum Periya Aalaiyile Pottaan.

20 nagaraththirkup Purampeyulla Andha Aalaiyile Adhu Midhikkappattadhu; Andha Aalaiyilirundhu Aayiraththarunooru Sthaadhi Thooraththirku Raththam Purappattuk Kudhiraigalin Kadivaalangalmattum Perugivandhadhu.
